Synopsis / Plot / Review

The famed ZATOICHI comes back to the screen once again - ICHI, in a female character. The story follows, Ichi, a blind shamisen-instrument player, always facing people who treat her coldly or try to take advantage of her. However, Ichi stands tall in dignity, and her emotions burst with action with the sword that she swings to fight back. Through the eyes that Ichi cannot see, we reach her soul and the true relief when she finally connects with others by finding love and friendship. -asianmediawiki
